messages.subject: Fw: you'd better watch out!
messages.msgSnippet: For the believers in Santa and their kidlets.  Take the naughty or nice quiz.  Be sure and go to the Reindeer barn (for big kids) and the Elf School (for
messages.messageBody:
For the believers in Santa and their kidlets. Take the naughty or nice
quiz. Be sure and go to the Reindeer barn (for big kids) and the Elf School
(for little kids and a cute "Elf Diploma").

Mine came back: "Nice, but has been naughty at times. Neatness and
politeness have been very good over the last two weeks. Shows proper respect
for others. Shares well, but could always be better. With a little more
effort could be near top of "nice" list."

Waaaaa, and here I thought I was perfect <<<BEWG>>>

Lynda
----- Original Message -----

>
> http://www.claus.com/naughtyornice/index.shtml
>
